original_text: The daughter of Egypt shall be confounded; she shall be delivered into the hand of the people of the north.
korean_text: 딸 애굽이 수치를 당하여 북쪽 백성의 손에 붙임을 당하리로다

sentences.original_text: The daughter of Egypt shall be confounded;
she shall be delivered into the hand
of the people of the north.
